labels.name: P4, unlikely to ever be fixed.

data.actual_result: Member list scrolling resets at the top
data.expected_result: You should stay at the point you were at in the member list
data.short_description: Rotating screen shoots you to the beginning of the member list
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server with a lot of members - Scroll far down in member list - Rotate screen
